metadata.description:
Before Vin Diesel’s BLOODSHOT hits the silver screen in 2020, experience the hit series that debuted Valiant’s nanite-enhanced commando!

Bloodshot. An unkillable fighting machine with a history so secret even he doesn’t know what it is. But when a rogue agent leaks the secrets of his forgotten past, Bloodshot declares a one man war on the billion-dollar defense contractor that wouldn’t let him stay dead.
metadata.name: Bloodshot: Definitive Edition
